description:
Do you know if you see the colors properly?

This app needs an internet connection to work properly.

ColorBlindness Analyser is the only application to offer an analysis of your color vision. 

The test consists of six exercises testing red, green and blue color vision : move a slider with your finger to match two colored areas together. The results are then processed to give a precise diagnosis (protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia) of your color vision. 
Each primary color is graded on a scale from 0% to 100%. 

To remove ads, buy PRO version !

Keywords: protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia, color blind, colorblind, color blindness, colorblindness, color deficient vision, dyschromatopsy,  color vision, daltonism, daltonien, daltonian

Application coded with enyoJS 2.2
